name: Unconditional Educational & School Based Services
description: Every child - regardless of zip code, family income, learning style, or past experience - deserves access to a world-class education. Through direct academic, social-emotional, and behavioral services for students and capacity-building support to schools and educators, Seneca works to foster inclusive school climates and transform the educational experience of students across California and Washington. Topics include: - Unconditional Education & School-Based Services - Coaching & Consultation -

howToGetIt: For more information, reach out to Robin Detterman at: robin_detterman@senecacenter.org or by calling (510) 872- 2046.
